text: Silent Thunder may refer to: * Silent Thunder: A-10 Tank Killer II, a 1996 video game * Silent Thunder: Breaking Through Cultural, Racial, and Class Barriers in Motorsports, a 2004 autobiography of Leonard W. Miller * Silent Thunder: In the Presence of Elephants, a 1998 book by Katy Payne *Silent Thunder, a 2014 novel by Archie Macpherson
title: Silent Thunder
